org.yakindu.scr

Class RuntimeService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.yakindu.scr.RuntimeService

  • public class RuntimeService
extends java.lang.Object
    Runtime service for state machines to execute a run to completion step periodically.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean cancelAll(long cyclePeriod)
      Cancels the execution of statemachines for the given cycle period.
      void cancelTimer()
      Cancels the execution of all registered statemachines.
      static RuntimeService getInstance()
      Returns the RuntimeService instance as singleton.
      boolean pauseAll(long cyclePeriod)
      Pauses the execution of all statemachines which are registered for the given cyclePeriod.
      boolean registerStatemachine(IStatemachine statemachine, long cyclePeriod)
      Registers an IStatemachine for scheduled fixed rate execution
      boolean resumeAll(long cyclePeriod)
      Resumes the execution of all statemachines which are registered for the given cyclePeriod.
      boolean unregisterStatemachine(IStatemachine statemachine, long cyclePeriod)
      Removes the given state machine from runtime service.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static RuntimeService getInstance()
        Returns the RuntimeService instance as singleton.
        Returns:
        The singleton RuntimeService instance

      • registerStatemachine

        public boolean registerStatemachine(IStatemachine statemachine,
                                    long cyclePeriod)
        Registers an IStatemachine for scheduled fixed rate execution
        Parameters:
        statemachine - - The statemachine to execute
        cyclePeriod - - the fixed rate cycle period for scheduling
        Returns:
        true if state machine is added properly.

      • unregisterStatemachine

        public boolean unregisterStatemachine(IStatemachine statemachine,
                                      long cyclePeriod)
        Removes the given state machine from runtime service.
        Parameters:
        statemachine - - the statemachine which should be removed
        cyclePeriod - - the scheduling cycle period of the statemachine
        Returns:
        true if state machine is removed properly.

      • cancelAll

        public boolean cancelAll(long cyclePeriod)
        Cancels the execution of statemachines for the given cycle period. This stops the execution of statemachines which are registered for the given cycle period and cancels the executing TimerTask.
        Returns:
        true if poperly cancelled

      • pauseAll

        public boolean pauseAll(long cyclePeriod)
        Pauses the execution of all statemachines which are registered for the given cyclePeriod.
        Parameters:
        cyclePeriod -
        Returns:
        true if properly paused

      • resumeAll

        public boolean resumeAll(long cyclePeriod)
        Resumes the execution of all statemachines which are registered for the given cyclePeriod.
        Parameters:
        cyclePeriod -
        Returns:
        true if properly resumed

      • cancelTimer

        public void cancelTimer()
        Cancels the execution of all registered statemachines. This cancels the executing Timer freeing all allocated resources and terminates all existing execution threads.
